properties.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Central Columbia River Gorge
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 2:46PM PST until January 13 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 2 inches,
mainly above 500 feet.

* WHERE...In Washington and Oregon, Central Columbia River Gorge.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed rain and snow showers below 500 feet.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM PST MONDAY
